name: Fur Earmuffs • Monster earmuffs
description:
Curious Little Bird earmuffs are the latest addition to our 2013/14 collection. Supported by inner wire frame they sit on the top of the head. They are a one size fits all kind of earmuff.

Curious Little Bird earmuffs will be a perfect option for those of you who don't want to compromise warm ears with great looking hair in cold season. Not to mention, you get a super adorable monster face that will surely make your earmuffs stand out from everyone else's!

Curious Little Bird Earmuffs can be made in one of the colours shown in the last picture.

................................................

More styles and colors coming soon! For latest updates check out our fanpage: www.facebook.com/curiouslittlebird

................................................

AVAILABILITY: made to order within 1-2 weeks 

COLOR OPTIONS: see last picture for reference 

FABRIC CONTENT: 100% faux fur

CARE INSTRUCTIONS: handwash in lukewarm water with mild detergent or dry clean

name: Monster plush keychain: Mini Red
description:
Mini Red is a little monster plush keychain made out of faux fur. Mini Red is a pocket buddy. He's small enough to fit in your pocket, and has a handy ring to attach to your keys, purse or backpack.

Mini Red is 3 in tall, and has plastic safety eyes, which makes him unsafe for children under 4 years of age.

NOTE: Each keychain is made as ordered, and I will do my best to make it as identical to the photo as possible.

IMPORTANT: Not recommend for young children as small pieces may pose a choking hazard.


**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Polky the fleece stuffed monster - Blue and white polka dots
description:
This is Polky. He is a stuffed fleece plush monster, and he is into surfboards and rainy days. His favorite music is R&B, and folk, and sometimes he'll listen to oldies.

He is a baby friendly monster, and is perfect for your newborn, or toddler because it's made with a body of fleece and a cotton face & horns. These monsters are soft, squishable, machine washable in any water temperature, and can be put in baby's mouth with no worries. 

He measures 9" tall from the tips of his horns to the bottom of her legs, and 8 inches wide.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

All designs are copyright ©Curious Little Bird!

name: Leo the stuffed fleece plush monster - Lime green leopard print
description:
This is Leo. He is a stuffed fleece plush monster, and he likes to dress up in a lime green leopard outfit because he's a bit geeky that way. If you like to wear capes, he likes to wear leopard clothing. :) His favorite thing is to listen to 80s rock music, and tweet silly things.

He is a baby friendly monster, and is perfect for your newborn, or toddler because it's made with a body of fleece and a cotton face & horns. These monsters are soft, squishable, machine washable in any water temperature, and can be put in baby's mouth with no worries. 

He measures 9" tall from the tips of his horns to the bottom of her legs, and 8 inches wide. Leo can come with a happy face if you prefer, please see last photo for happy face example.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

All designs are copyright ©Curious Little Bird!

name: Caramel the stuffed fleece monster for baby
description:
Meet Caramel. He is a baby friendly stuffed fleece monster, and is perfect for your newborn, or toddler because it's made with a body of fleece and a cotton face & horns. These monsters are soft, squishable, machine washable in any water temperature, and can be put in baby's mouth with no worries. 

He measures 9" tall from the tips of his horns to the bottom of her legs, and 8 inches wide. You have the choice of happy face or regular. Please see the last photo for a happy face example.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

All designs are copyright ©Curious Little Bird!

name: Lucy the stuffed fleece monster - Purple skating monkeys
description:
This is Lucy. She is a stuffed fleece monster, and she likes to dress up in her purple fleece dancing monkeys suit because she lives in the 90s when that was cook. She loves matching running suits, mustard yellow shag carpeting and anything else that is vintage.

She is a baby friendly monster, and is perfect for your newborn, or toddler because it's made with a body of fleece and a cotton face & horns. These monsters are soft, squishable, machine washable in any water temperature, and can be put in baby's mouth with no worries. 

She measures 9" tall from the tips of his horns to the bottom of her legs, and 8 inches wide. Please note that Lucy can come with a happy face (see last photo for example).

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

All designs are copyright ©Curious Little Bird!

name: Pinky the plush fleece stuffed monster - Pink checkered
description:
This is Pinky. She is a plush fleece stuffed monster, and she is a very sweet monster that will cuddle up to anyone who hangs on to her tightly with a little fist. Pinky is a giggle monster, ensuing happiness wherever she goes.

She is a baby friendly monster, and is perfect for your newborn, or toddler because it's made with a body of fleece and a cotton face & horns. These monsters are soft, squishable, machine washable in any water temperature, and can be put in baby's mouth with no worries. 

She measures 9" tall from the tips of his horns to the bottom of her legs, and 8 inches wide. Please note that Pinky can come with a happy face (see last photo for example).

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq
All designs are copyright ©Curious Little Bird!

name: Plush Monster: Silla the silver monster
description:
Silla is silver, and shaggy and a very lovely monster. He's got this really shiny fur that makes me very special. Silla loves to smile, but is a bit of a shy monster. You just have to coax him with a bit of banana and he'll open up to you. He is a great listener.

Silla is made out of faux fur in silver, with felt horns and face, and her features have been machine embroidered on. She measures 9" wide from the tips of her horns, and 8 inches to the bottom of her legs.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Sinon the hazelnut plush monster
description:
Meet Sinon! He's a little plush monster named after a Greek character from the book Discord's Apple. The character was Sinon of Ithaca, the guy who helped take fown Troy. He then got captured by Apollo, and in turn was immortal due to a chain around his neck that he couldn't remove. Sinon the monster is perhaps immortal, but let's not find out, okay? :)

Sinon is made out of creamy hazelnut fur, and has horns made out of antique gold felt. He measures 8 inches wide (20.32 cm) and 9 inches tall (22.86 cm) from arm to arm, and legs to tips of his horns. He has a smile that has been embroidered on, so it'll never go away. :) He's stuffed with polyester fiberfill, and his fur is so soft you'll want to cuddle with him all day!

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Pepper the teal plush monster
description:
Pepper is a silly plush monster in dark teal who will steal your cookies during tea time when you're not looking. She'll point and say "Oh! Look at that!" and when you turn away, she takes what's clearly not hers. Pepper loves cookies.

Pepper is made out of faux fur in a dark teal, with felt horns and face, and her features have been machine embroidered on. She measures 9" wide from the tips of her horns, and 8 inches to the bottom of her legs.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Jasmine the purple stuffed monster
description:
This is Jasmine. She's a cute stuffed monster donned in purple furry fur, and pink or yellow horns. She likes holidays spent relaxing on the couch with her friend, reading a good book or watching a great action flick. She'll tell you secrets if you promise not to blurt them out to strangers.

Jasmine is about 9-10 inches tall, and about 8-9 inches wide.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Sage the green winged stuffed monster
description:
Sage is a cute green stuffed monster, and she has adorable wings! She loves to fly around the apartment, watching you work, or just being happy. You can choose to order her with a regular face, or now a happy face!!

Sage is made out of faux fur with felt horns and face, and her features have been machine embroidered on. She measures 9" wide from the tips of her horns, and 7 inches to the bottom of her legs.


**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Cordelia the Stuffed Monster in Purple Shag
description:
Cordelia is a little stuffed monster in purple shag fur. She's a fan of listening to music in her little monster apartment, dancing it up, and having the occasional party! 

Cordelia measures 8 inches wide (20.32 cm) and 9 inches tall (22.86 cm) from arm to arm, and legs to tips of her horns. She has a smile that has been embroidered on, so it'll never go away. :) She's stuffed with polyester fiberfill, and want to be adopted!

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Peach the super soft orange plush monster
description:
Peach is an orange stuffed monster that is just gaga for Lady Gaga. She really loves her music, and will bop away on her legs, and smile away in pure enjoyment. She also likes pop music just as much, but Lady Gaga is her go to music.

Peach is made out of faux fur in orange, with felt horns and face, and her features have been machine embroidered on. She measures 9" wide from the tips of her horns, and 8 inches to the bottom of her legs.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.

name: Marvin the two toned fur stuffed monster
description:
This is Marvin. Marvin is a real big science fiction buff. His favourite show is Star Trek: The Next Generation. You can ask him anything, cause he knows all the details about the show! 

Marvin is about 9-10 inches tall, and about 8-9 inches wide.


**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Wooky the brown stuffed monster
description:
Remember the cute stuffed monster, Wooky you all loved so much!? Well he's back, and better than ever! This is Wooky #2! He's still the same awesome Wooky, but dressed in a slightly different fur. He's still cute, soft and growly as ever.

He measures measures 9 inches wide from the tips of his horns, and 7.5 inches to the bottom of his legs. He's made out of brand new faux fur, has a felt face and horns, and his face is machine embroidered with care.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Pika the red plush monster
description: Pika is a funny sort of plush monster. She's red, white, and red some more! She really likes books, reading, lounging in the library and reading. Yes, this is a bookworm monster! She is very intelligent too! Pika is made out of faux fur in red and white, with felt horns and face, and her features have been machine embroidered on. She measures 9" tall from the tips of her horns to the bottom of her legs, and 8 inches wide. This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq This monster is made out of limited edition fur. Once out, he will no longer be available. **This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Puffy the blue Plush Monster
description:
Puffy is blue, fluffy, and very adorable plush monster! He's the kind of monster you want hanging out with you because he's happy, and loves to just chill in the sun with his favorite drink.

Puffy is made out of faux fur with felt horns and face, and his features have been machine embroidered on. He measures 9" wide from the tips of his horns, and 8 inches to the bottom of his legs.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

name: Moose the stuffed monster
description: Moose is a stuffed monster fireman. He's big, fluffy, royal blue, and can lift anyone or anything onto his shoulder and rescue them, bringing them to safety. Moose measures 9 inches wide (22.86 cm) and 9 inches tall (22.86 cm) from arm to arm, and legs to tips of his horns. He face has been embroidered on, so it'll never go away. :) He's stuffed with polyester fiberfill, and want to be adopted! This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Once out, he will no longer be available. **This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Berry the pink plush stuffed monster
description:
Berry is an awesome plush stuffed monster in bright pink fur, and totally cute! Her horns are a nice contrasting colour which make her stand out from the crowd. She loves to be cuddled, and maybe even read a story.

Berry is lovingly made using faux fur and felt. She is machine stitched. Her insides are filled with non-allergenic, 100% poly fiber.

She measures 9" wide from the tips of her horns, and 9 inches to the bottom of her legs.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Stuffed Monster Gordon - Olive green
description:
Meet Gordon! He's a little mister that loves apple pie! He's the kind of stuffed monster that if left unattended, will sneak away to the kitchen and eat the pie that you left to cool on the counter top. Besides being pie crazy, Gordon is super sweet, and loves people!

Gordon is made out of super soft olive green fur, and has apple green horns. He measures 8 inches wide (20.32 cm) and 9 inches tall (22.86 cm) from arm to arm, and legs to tips of his horns. He has a smile that has been embroidered on, so it'll never go away. :) He's stuffed with polyester fiberfill, and his fur is so soft you'll want to cuddle with him all day!

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Drew the smart stuffed monster
description:
This plush monster, Drew, is a know it all. He knows that π (pi) is the 16th letter of the Greek alphabet, and that Schrödinger's cat is a thought experiment. He's a very intelligent stuffed monster, Drew, and his IQ is 140. Oh, he's also a member of Mensa.

Drew was lovingly made using baby pink plush fabric and felt. His face was machine embroidered. His insides are filled with 100% poly fiber. He measures 9" wide from the tips of her horns, and 9 inches to the bottom of his legs.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

*All monsters are copyright Curious LIttle Bird

name: Bloo the concerned plush monster
description:
Here's Bloo. He's a plush monster and he's a little concerned. He's concerned you're not environmentally friendly like he is, are you? I'm sure if you assure him that you are, he'll be happier. He is a pretty happy monster when he knows the earth is being taken care of.

Bloo was lovingly made using recycled (washed) faux fur blanket and felt. He was machine and hand stitched. His insides are filled with non-allergenic, 100% poly fiber.

He measures measures 9" wide from the tips of his horns, and 8 inches to the bottom of his legs.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Snowy the white plush monster
description:
Snowy is a plush monster originates from the same country as Snowy the Yeti pillow, except that they're not related. He's seen the sasquatch, climbed mount Everest, and been to Tibet for some calming meditation. Snowy's next adventure will take him to the Great Wall of China, and Thailand for some culture.

Snowy is made out of white faux fur, with felt horns and face, and her features have been machine embroidered on. She measures 9" wide from the tips of her horns, and 8 inches to the bottom of her legs.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Kat the unicorn plush monster
description:
Meet Kat. She's a cute plush monster who is purple, and also part unicorn. Her mom is Dhraxy, and her dad was that unicorn you heard about in the dark forest that got slayed by Voldemort. Kat is looking for a home where she can be appreciated for her odd uniqueness.

Kat is also the last of her kind. She is the last unicorn monster ever made, and should be considered to be a treasured monster.

Kat is made out of faux fur with felt horns and face, and her features have been machine embroidered on. He measures 9" wide from the tips of her horns, and 8 inches to the bottom of her legs.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.

name: Plush Monster: Cherry the pink monster
description:
Cherry is a very pink monster who loves warm climates. She's originally from Australia, and if you listen very closely, you can almost hear her accent when she speaks.

Cherry is made out of faux fur, with felt horns and face, and her features have been machine embroidered on. She measures 9" wide from the tips of her horns, and 8 inches to the bottom of her legs.

name: Plush Monster: Big Bloo the large blue monster
description:
Meet Big Bloo! He's a plush monster of the taller variety. He likes long walks on the beach and watching sunsets. His favorite pass time is reading spy novels. He would love to share his passions with a special friend.

Big Bloo measures 12 inches tall (30.48 cm) and 10 inches wide (25.4 cm). He's made out of soft, baby blue plush fabric, with white felt for his face and horns out of a darker blue. He's been completely machine stitched which makes him a perfect gift for all ages. He's also machine washable on warm, dry on warm.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

name: Chester the Purple Stuffed Monster • LIMITED EDITION
description: Meet Chester! He's a very large purple stuffed monster. He's a cousin of the smaller, more "regular" monsters. Chester comes from the mountains where all the wild things live. They live solitary lives, and Chester got lonely (just like Bernard and his other large furry friends), and now wants to be adopted into a great home. This monster is made out of limited edition fur. Once out, he will no longer be available. **This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Plush monster: YakYak the mountain monster
description:
Meet YakYak! He's a very large puffy blue plush monster. He's a cousin of the smaller, more "regular" monsters. YakYak comes from the mountains where all the wild things live. They live solitary lives, and YakYak got lonely (just like Bernard and his other large furry friends), and now wants to be adopted into a great home.

YakYak measures 12 inches tall and 12 inches wide. He's made out of soft, baby blue fur, with white felt for his face and ears. He's been completely machine stitched which makes him a perfect gift for all ages. He's also machine washable on warm, dry on warm.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Plush Monster: Hagrid the large brown monster
description:
Meet Hagrid! He's a very large brown plush monster. He's a cousin of the smaller, more "regular" monsters. Hagrid comes from the mountains where all the wild things live. They live solitary lives, and Hagrid got lonely (just like Bernard, Chester and his other large furry friends), and now wants to be adopted into a great home.

Hagrid measures 12 inches tall (30.48 cm) and 10 inches wide (25.4 cm). He's made out of soft, brown shag fur, with ivory felt for his face and ears. He's been completely machine stitched which makes him a perfect gift for all ages. He's also machine washable on warm, dry on warm.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Ag the silver fur stuffed monster
description:
Ag is a silver fur stuffed monster, and is made out of pure silver (kidding!). But his fur is very silvery, which makes him very special, indeed. Ag possesses the highest electrical conductivity of any monster and the highest thermal conductivity. He's certainly worth keeping around.

Ag measures 9 inches high and about 8 inches wide.

©Designs are all by Curious Little Bird

name: Arctica the snowy white furry monster
description:
Arctica is a snowy white furry monster from up north. He is originally from the north pole, and has travelled a long way to come to the city in order to be adopted. His favorite times are sledding, and drinking hot chocolate.

Lovingly made out of faux fur, Arctica will surely make the best friend a human has ever had. :)

Arctica measures 9 inches high and about 8 inches wide.

NB: Arctica is made to order. His beard may vary between blue, blue/purple, or purple/pink because of the fabric that I use has all three colours. I will do my best to make it like the photo, but please note that each monster will vary slightly, despite my trying my best to make it like the photograph.

Thank you!

*****

Thanks so much for looking! Add me to your favourites for special offers :)
Come visit me on Facebook for new product sneak-peaks, discounts & giveaways!
Curious Little Bird http://www.facebook.com/curiouslittlebird

name: Leopold the brown leopard fur stuffed monster
description:
Leopold is a brown leopard fur bearded stuffed monster, and he's a descendent from leopards from tropical Asia. His scientific name is Leopoldus Panthera pardus.

Leopold measures 9 inches high and about 8 inches wide.

©Designs are all by Curious Little Bird

name: Sully the blue & white fur stuffed monster
description:
Sully is a blue & white fur stuffed monster, and has attended Monster University to be the best kid laugher there is! He works hard, and he gets the job done. Without Sully, there'd be no happy kids out there.

Sully measures 9 inches high and about 8 inches wide.

©Designs are all by Curious Little Bird

name: Coralie the pink & white fur stuffed monster
description:
Coralie is a pink & white fur stuffed monster, and she's an expert skydiver. She has skydived 100 times, and nothing will stop her from skydiving 100 more times. She gets an adrenaline rush from the free fall.

Coralie measures 9 inches high and about 8 inches wide.

©Designs are all by Curious Little Bird

name: Brownie The brown fur bearded stuffed monster
description:
Brownie is a brown fur bearded stuffed monster, and he's absolutely in love with the food, brownies (hence his name). Brownie's favorite kind of brownie is the dark chocolate one with the icing on top. He'll gobble those up in the blink of an eye.

Brownie measures 10 inches high and about 9 inches wide.

©Designs are all by Curious Little Bird

name: Lemmy the Yellow shag fur bearded stuffed monster
description:
Lemmy is a yellow shag fur, bearded stuffed monster, and is not at all related to lemmings, but monsters. Lemmy's favorite thing of all time is cuddling up on the couch under a blanket, with a bowl of freshly made popcorn, and watching Lost In Translation. It's his absolute most favorite movie of all time!

Lemmy measures 10 inches high and about 9 inches wide.

©Designs are all by Curious Little Bird

name: Wabbit the black and white fur spotted monster
description:
Wabbit is a  black and white fur spotted monster. He's aptly named Wabbit because he sort of looks like a rabbit, does he not? He loves celery with peanut butter, and cuddles. 

Wabbit measures 9 inches high and about 8 inches wide.

©Designs are all by Curious Little Bird

name: Stuffed Yeti Monster: Fenwick the teenage yeti
description:
Fenwick is a teenage stuffed yeti monster. He's just arrived from the wooded areas of northern Quebec, and he's found civilization, and I think he likes it. With a name like Fenwick, you'd think he was born here. His mom was part city Yeti, part wooded Yeti, and he never knew his dad.

Fenwick measures 10.5 inches tall, and 11 inches wide. He's made out of soft, white faux fur, and baby blue felt horns. His face was hand embroidered.

If Fenwick should get dirty, just spot wash him with warm water and a bit of soap and let air dry, or else you could wash him in the machine on warm (never hot), and tumble dry warm (not hot). He doesn't mind a little bath. A comb will straighten out his fur right away.

This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Skullian the Skull Stuffed Monster - Guardian of the Skully Underworld
description: Meet Skullian. He is a skull stuffed monster, and he once was the guardian of the Skully underworld, Skullia. He has been thus banned from his world due to the fact that he has fur. Not a usual thing for Skullys to have... So he moved up to our world, where he roams alone, looking for a good home where he can still be guardian and friend to that special someone. Skullian measures 11 inches wide, and 9 inches tall. He's made out of blue/black faux fur, and has a felt face. He's super soft, and stuffed with brand new polyester fiberfill. This monster is the very last one available! **This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Stuffed Yeti Monster - Geoffrey the Yeti Monster
description: Geoffrey is a stuffed yeti monster, and he's the new 'kid' in town. He's just arrived from the wooded areas of northern Quebec, and he's found civilization, and I think he likes it. With a name like Geoffrey, you'd think he was born here. His mom was part city Yeti, part wooded Yeti, and he never knew his dad. Geoffrey measures 10.5 inches tall, and 11 inches wide. He's made out of soft, white faux fur, and brown felt horns. His face was hand embroidered. **If you would like to customize his horn colour, please choose a colour from the options below. If you don't see a colour you want, please contact me to see if the colour you want is available. ** If you would like to customize Geoffrey's face and hand colour, please contact me with the felt colour(s). Thank you for your understanding! If Geoffrey should get dirty, just spot wash him with warm water and a bit of soap and let air dry, or else you could wash him in the machine on warm (never hot), and tumble dry warm (not hot). He doesn't mind a little bath. A comb will straighten out his fur right away. If his horns straighten out a bit, just curl them with your hand. This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq **This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: One of a Kind Rainbow Stuffed Yeti
description:
Geoffrey, the rainbow stuffed yeti is an elusive creature, somewhat like the unicorn. Only seen by the rare few, Geoffrey is a special friend to have. ;)  Made with cotton/polyester horns and paws, he's quite the colourful creature.

© Curious Little Bird

name: Je t'aime (I love you) - Hand embroidered wall art - Ready to Ship
description:
Je t'aime (I love you) hand embroidered wall art is sure to brighten up any wall in your house, work studio, or office! He would make a great birthday present as well!

Measures 10.5" and comes ready to hang on the back of the hoop (rests on a nail or tack). If you would like yarn or string attached to the hoop please ask.

Curious Little Bird embroideries are made by me, without any pattern. All embroidered images come from my mind, and each stitch is done by hand.

Ready to ship in 1-3 business days.

© Curious Little Bird 2013

name: Berry the hand embroidered wall art - Ready to Ship
description:
Berry the embroidered monster is sure to brighten up any wall in your house, work studio, or office! She would make a great birthday present as well!

Measures 8" and comes ready to hang on the back of the hoop (rests on a nail or tack).  If you would like yarn or string attached to the hoop please ask.

Curious Little Bird embroideries are made by me, without any pattern. All embroidered images come from my mind, and each stitch is done by hand.

Ready to ship in 1-3 business days.

name: Pillow Monster: Choose Your Own Fabric
description: This listing is for a custom pillow monster of your desire, made especially for you with your choice of colours. (Please read through this whole listing before purchasing.) The pillow monster will measure about 18" tall x 17" wide (this is not including the horns/arms/legs). 1. What you need to do is choose a main body colour for your pillow. The colour of the horns, face, arms & legs will be chosen by me based on what fabric I have available in my stash (and what goes nicely with the colour you've chosen). 2. When you've arrived to pay in PayPal, under your address it will say NOTE TO SELLER: ADD In note to seller please state any preferences you would like. For example: "I don't like red, so don't use that colour for the horns or limbs, please!" ** The photos of the pillow monsters will give you an idea of what the horns, arms and legs look like. Not all pillow monsters will have a pattern on the limbs. Some may have a solid colour. These photos are just for reference, and to show you approximately what yours will look like. Please allow up to 4 days for completion before your Furry Monster is shipped to you. If you are in an absolute rush; please let me know before you purchase and I'll let you know if I can make your deadline! Contact me if you have any questions at all before purchase and I will be more than happy to answer them! NOTE: This pillow monster is currently only available in Montreal, Quebec as a pick up package, as the shipping is too expensive. I'm sorry for the inconvenience. If you would like to have it shipped, here are the shipping costs: Canada: $28.00 U.S.A.: $50 Everywhere else: $105 If you would like to pay for the shipping, please contact me in advance and I will add the shipping to the listing for you. Thank you! All Rights Reserved © Curious Little Bird

name: Custom furry Monster Tote Bag - Unique Gift Ideas
description: Do you love unique gift ideas? Having trouble finding that special gift? Well, this custom furry monster tote bag is bound to brighten any dull shopping chores, and make the perfect gift! One can keep it in their handbag for those unexpected shopping ventures/library visits, or it could make a fun bag to carry work lunch in. Each monster you get on your bag will be the actual size of the plush toys I sell. Furry monsters are 7x9". The creature you choose is then sewn to the canvas bag giving you a monster you can carry around with you! It is machine washable in cool water, and on a delicate cycle, or better for the environment and for the bag, hand wash in warm water. It can be dried in the dryer, on permanent press (the cooler the air, the longer your fur will stay true and not melt - hot air will just melt the fur). This will keep it in tip top condition for longer. If after a washing the fur is a little messy, just comb it out, and you're good to go! This monster is appliquéd by machine, and the bag is a medium weight 100% eco-friendly cotton bag. The bag measures 14 inches tall, by 14 inches wide. My logo is ironed on using transfer paper. NOTE: If you would prefer a bag that can be carried on your shoulder, please let me know before purchasing this bag. The larger bag is a little larger, and a bit more expensive. Choose any monster you would like added to your bag from this link: http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/products When you've arrived to pay in PayPal, under your address it will say NOTE TO SELLER: ADD In note to seller please state which monster you would like, example: "Silla the monster on my bag, please!" (you can provide the link to be extra sure I know which one you mean). Please allow 1 week for the custom bag to be created before it's shipped out! :) Thanks so much! For any questions, please contact me and I will be more than happy to assist you!

name: Cell Phone Sleeve: Monster face iPhone / iPod cell phone case
description: Now's your chance to own a one of a kind Curious Little Bird cell phone sleeve! Made out of eco-responsible felt, stitched for reinforcement, and decorated with your favourite monster face & fur! This sleeve will keep your cell phone safe from scratches. Each cell phone sleeve measures 8.5 cm (3.25 in) wide and 14 cm (5.5 in) tall. This cell phone sleeve will fit any phone you own... iPhone, Android. Please choose your colour preference below for your cell phone sleeve. Please note: The sleeve does NOT come with a cell phone! The phone is just for reference. • • •  Your cell phone sleeve will ship within 3 days of purchase! :)

name: Skull Cell Phone Sleeve - iPhone Case/iPod Case
description: Now's your chance to own a one of a kind Curious Little Bird skull cell phone sleeve! Made out of eco-responsible felt, stitched for reinforcement, and decorated with a skull and crossbones! You can get the phone with or without the bow! This sleeve will keep your cell phone safe from scratches. Each cell phone sleeve measures 8.5 cm (3.25 in) wide and 14 cm (5.5 in) tall. This cell phone sleeve will fit any phone you own... iPhone, Android. Please choose your colour preference below for your cell phone sleeve bow. Please note: The sleeve does NOT come with a cell phone! The phone is just for reference. • • •  Your cell phone sleeve will ship within 3 days of purchase! :)

name: Custom stuffed toy from a drawing - Design your own monster
description:
Want a monster designed and created based from your child's (or your) sketch? Then you've found the right person to do this! I can do a stuffed toy from a drawing!

**The sketch and monster in the photo are just examples of previous custom plush toys I did for a few customers. :-)

Procedure: Email me a detailed sketch of the monster with any colour choices you would like and where. From that I will pick something from my fabric collection. Remember, color and fabric print will depend on the good stuff in my "stash". :) I use new and recycled fabrics from thrift store finds if I can, but I'll buy your fabric from the fabric store if I don't have it and can't find it.

[b]**The reason there are no fabric photos is because my stash of fabric is ever changing. Please email me for current availability. Do not assume your monster will be made out of fur. Depending on the colour, I may make it in cotton/polyester, or some other fabric I have on hand. If you do insist on fur, please mention it beforehand![/b]

Eyes will be made with felt, or if available, plastic safety eyes. It's up to you.

With your purchase I'll send you a quick list of questions (if I have any), to help you create your one of a kind plush monster just the way you like it!

The final monster will be about 10 inches tall and width depends on your sketch (due to the size of my packaging, I cannot go any bigger than 10 inches). They're all machine stitched and stuffed with new polyester fiberfill.

Turnaround time is about one week from order to shipping, but it may take longer if I have to hunt down a fabric color. I will contact you if there will be a delay.

**This design and all designs in my shop are copyright of Curious Little Bird.**

name: Design Your Own Plush Monster: Regular sized Monster In Your Choice Of Colors
description: This listing is for you to design your own plush monster of your desire, made especially for you with your choice of colours. (Please read through this whole listing before purchasing.) About my my furry monsters: Eye colour will always be black embroidery, unless otherwise specified. Perfect for all ages, great as a mantelpiece, a child's toy, great for gifts to adults. The list goes on, but they are sweet and cuddly and great! One monster measures 20-22 cm by 20-22 cm (8-9 inches by 8-9 inches) and is machine washable, but on warm wash and warm dry (not hot, or else the fur will melt). Here's what I need from you: Copy and paste the following into CONTACT page: Face choice (Reg. or Happy) • Face colour (choose colour) • Body colour (choose colour from drop down menu) • Body shape (which number?) • Horn shape (arms or no arms) • Horn colour (choose colour) Please write them down before you go to checkout, or keep a 2nd window open for reference. This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq Contact me if you have any questions at all before purchase and I will be more than happy to answer them! All Rights Reserved © Curious Little Bird

name: Custom Plush Monster: Large furry monster in your choice of colours
description: This item is MADE TO ORDER, please allow up to 3 days for creation before I ship your new friend! This listing is for a custom large furry monster of your choice. Made especially for you with your choice of colours. (Please read through this whole listing before purchasing.) About my my furry monsters: Eye colour will always be black embroidery. These are perfect for all ages, great as a mantelpiece, a child's toy, great for gifts to adults. The list goes on, but they are sweet and cuddly and great! One monster measures 30.5 cm by 25.4 cm (12 inches by 10 inches) and is machine washable, but on warm wash and warm dry (not hot, or else the fur will melt). In PayPal (after you log in), under your address at the very top you'll see "NOTE TO SELLER". It's not very big, one very small line, and that's where you will add all of the extra information you couldn't choose in the drop down menu. If you didn't see it, you can always contact me on my contact page with the info. NOW... Here's what I need from you: Just copy and paste the following into the message to seller and fill in your preferences. Face choice: (choose 'happy monster face' or 'regular monster face' - see 2nd photo) Body colour: Choose from the drop down menu Face & Horn colour: Choose from the drop down menu I have listed all the colours of fur and felt I carry, so please choose from the colours in the drop down menu. If it is not listed, it means I'm out of stock. For ideas on horn placement, please see my sold monsters. You can choose to have your horns in the regular spot, or perhaps have them at the very top of the head, or lower. This monster will ship within 3 days of being ordered. Please see shipping policies for more information. http://www.curiouslittlebird.ca/faq Contact me if you have any questions at all before purchase and I will be more than happy to answer them! All Rights Reserved © Curious Little Bird
